TopicTitle: KSP loads partial vessels instead of not loading anything

Articles.Content:
My one great wish is when you remove a mod, for which there is a mod part, I wish at least when you go into the assembly building and load the ship, that the ship loads minus the mod part, and maybe a notice that you have to rectify the issue before you can save.

instead of having to go through every ship I have trying to find all the mod parts before I update a mod which the new version breaks everything (looking at you KAS)

I don't use too many mod parts, but I hate the fact that the whole thing gets hosed because of one part.

Even if the game loaded a broken ship, it would save me on having to rebuild the whole darn thing.

I have no problems with flights being canceled out, because with out the part, they probably would fly apart anyway.
